评论详情: Sexy jacket I ordered a large and it fits good ..this is a jacket you wear with a sexy dress
Fits true to size with a little wiggle room which allows a perfect if you wear a sweater or dress in layers. Sexy fit and great quality! I love this jacket!!!

This jacket is exactly like the photo! A really nice cut, good weight, and lined. Unfortunately I had to return it because I purchased an XL which was slightly too big in the body, and the arms were way too long for me.
This pink leather jacket is absolutely gorgeous, it matched perfectly with my pink and purple outfit. Everyone loved the style and talked about taking it off of me.
Fit to size according to chart. Received many compliments.  Very comfortable.
I didn't like the fit.  It was too big. Other than that, very nice jacket!.  I had to return it.
I should of order a medium. But otherwise very cool jacket.
This jacket was beautiful, with great material but I returned because it was too big on me. I order a medium expecting it to be tight fitted.

评论概述: Jacket is Fiya! Zippers and studs, not so much.
评论详情: Love the style and the alligator print is a plus. The jacket fits well, a little sung but this jacket should fit close.  I got a large and tried on with a lightweight sweatshirt. I would give 4 stars but the quality of the zippers are low budget so be careful with the zippers, and as soon as I took it out of the package, a stud came off. I fixed it though. This was a gift from my sister and I had to return the first one because the zippers were awkward and off track. This one is better but they are flimsy. Can't wait to rock this, and the color is everything!  Will look fly with jeans!

评论概述: Not as snug as you would think
评论详情: I am 5'7'' and 120 lbs.  I ordered the xxsmall and normally I am xsmall.  I love the jacket but it does not fit snug. There are no pockets and the flaps up top do not snap down.  The zippers are a bit awkward.  The sleeves are a little roomy which is nice, doesn't leave you feeling like you can't move your arms.

评论概述: Not the same as the lookbook jacket
评论详情: I had to return this jacket. I have an XL in the original lookbook version of this jacket and it fits great. I ordered this one hoping it was the same but the XL is probably 2 sizes to small. Order 1-2 sizes larger than normal.
LOVED this jacket... had to return because it was too small. I'd go a couple sizes up

评论概述: I like the jacket it was too small

评论详情: Nachdem ich die Jacke eine Nummer kleiner bestellt habe bin ich total zufrieden. Jacke passt sehr gut.
